data.name: CapabilityExpressionEvaluator_Exception_InvalidExpression
data.value: Invalid expression, position: {0}.

data.name: Diagnostics_OptionDescription
data.value: Enables diagnostic output.

data.name: DisableProjectContextEval_OptionDescription
data.value: Disables evaluating project context using MSBuild.

data.name: DisableSdkTemplates_OptionDescription
data.value: If present, prevents templates bundled in the SDK from being presented.

data.name: MSBuildEvaluationResult_Error_NoProjectFound
data.value: No project was found at the path: {0}.
data.comment: {0} - the file path where project was expected to be found.

data.name: MSBuildEvaluationResult_Error_NotRestored
data.value: {0} is not restored.
data.comment: {0} - the full path to the project.

data.name: MSBuildEvaluator_Error_NoTargetFramework
data.value: Project '{0}' is a SDK-style project, but does not specify the framework.
data.comment: {0} - the full path to the project.

data.name: MultipleProjectsEvaluationResult_Error
data.value: Multiple projects found: {0}.
data.comment: {0} - semi-colon separated list of path to projects found.

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Error_NoProjectsToAdd
data.value: Add project reference to solution action is not configured correctly in the template. Unable to determine the project files to add.

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Error_NoSolutionFile
data.value: Unable to determine which solution file to add the reference to.

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Error_BothInRootAndSolutionFolderSpecified
data.value: Add project reference to solution action is not configured correctly in the template. The 'solutionFolder' and 'inRoot' cannot be used together; use only one of the options.
data.comment: do not translate: 'solutionFolder', 'inRoot'

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Failed
data.value: Failed to add project(s) to the solution: {0}
data.comment: {0} - the reason why operation failed, normally ends with period

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Failed_NoReason
data.value: Failed to add project(s) to a solution file.

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Running
data.comment: {0} - list of file paths to projects to add, {1} - the path to target solution file, {2} - the solution folder inside solution to add the projects to.

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_InRoot_Running
data.comment: {0} - list of file paths to projects to add, {1} - the path to target solution file

data.name: PostAction_AddProjToSln_Succeeded
data.value: Successfully added project(s) to a solution file.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_AddPackageReference
data.value: Adding a package reference {0} to project file {1}:

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_AddPackageReference_Failed
data.value: Failed to add package reference: {0}
data.comment: {0} - the reason why operation failed, normally ends with period

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_AddPackageReference_WithVersion
data.value: Adding a package reference {0} (version: {1}) to project file {2}:

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_AddProjectReference
data.value: Adding a project reference {0} to project file {1}:

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_AddProjectReference_Failed
data.value: Failed to add project reference: {0}
data.comment: {0} - the reason why operation failed, normally ends with period

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Error_ActionMisconfigured
data.value: Add reference action is not configured correctly in the template.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Error_FrameworkNotSupported
data.value: Unable to automatically add the framework reference {0} to the project. Manually edit the project file to add it.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Error_ProjFileListHeader
data.value: Project files found:

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Error_UnresolvedProjFile
data.value: Unable to determine which project file to add the reference to.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Error_UnsupportedRefType
data.value: Adding reference type {0} is not supported.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Failed
data.value: Failed to add a reference to the project file.

data.name: PostAction_AddReference_Succeeded
data.value: Successfully added a reference to the project file.

data.name: PostAction_Restore_Error_FailedToDetermineProjectToRestore
data.value: Couldn't determine files to restore.

data.name: PostAction_Restore_Error_NoProjectsToRestore
data.value: No projects are configured to restore. Check primary outputs configuration in template.json.

data.name: PostAction_Restore_Failed
data.value: Restore failed.

data.name: PostAction_Restore_RestoreFailed
data.value: Failed to perform restore: {0}
data.comment: {0} - the reason why operation failed, normally ends with period

data.name: PostAction_Restore_Running
data.value: Restoring {0}:
data.comment: {0} - path to a project to restore

data.name: PostAction_Restore_Succeeded
data.value: Restore succeeded.

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraintFactory_Exception_EvaluationFailed
data.value: Failed to create constraint '{0}': failed to evaluate the project: {1}
data.comment: {0} - type of constraint (non-localizable), {1} - localized reason why evaluation failed, ends with period.

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraintFactory_Exception_NoEvaluator
data.value: Failed to create constraint '{0}': {1} component is not available.
data.comment: {0} - type of constraint (non-localizable), {1} - name of required component (non-localizable).

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_DisplayName
data.value: Project capabiltities

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Error_ArgumentShouldBeString
data.value: argument should be a string
data.comment: part of a sentence

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Error_ArgumentShouldNotBeEmpty
data.value: arguments should not contain empty values
data.comment: part of a sentence

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Error_InvalidConstraintConfiguration
data.value: Invalid constraint configuration
data.comment: part of a sentence

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Error_InvalidJson
data.value: invalid JSON
data.comment: part of a sentence

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_EvaluationFailed_Message
data.value: Failed to evaluate project context: {0}
data.comment: {0} - failure reason

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_Message
data.value: The template needs project capability '{0}', and current project ({1}) does not satisfy it.
data.comment: {0} - project capability expression (non-localizable), {1} - path to the project.

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_MultipleProjectsFound_CTA
data.value: Specify the project to use using {0} option.
data.comment: {0} - option to use - non localizable

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_NonSDKStyle_Message
data.value: The project {0} is not an SDK style project, and is not supported for evaluation. It is only possible to use this template with SDK-style projects.
data.comment: {0} - path to the project

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_NoProjectFound_CTA
data.value: This template can only be created inside the project.

data.name: ProjectCapabilityConstraint_Restricted_NotRestored_CTA
data.value: Run 'dotnet restore {0}' to restore the project.
data.comment: {Locked="dotnet restore {0}"}

data.name: ProjectContextSymbolSource_DisplayName
data.value: Project context

data.name: SdkInfoProvider_Message_InstallSdk
data.value: Go to aka.ms/get-dotnet and install any of the supported SDK versions: '{0}'.
data.comment: {0} is the list of supported versions.

data.name: SdkInfoProvider_Message_SwitchSdk
data.value: You have other SDK version(s) installed that can be used to run this template. Switch to any of the following SDK(s) on your system to run this template: '{0}'. Details on selecting SDK version to run: https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/tools/global-json.
data.comment: {0} is the list of installed and supported versions.

data.name: Verbosity_OptionDescription
data.value: Sets the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], and diag[nostic].

data.name: WorkloadInfoProvider_Message_AddWorkloads
data.value: Run 'dotnet workload search' to search workloads available to be installed on your SDK.
data.comment: {Locked="dotnet workload search"}
